review: I use this for 2 things: 1) to stream Netflix; 2) to stream Prime content. It does both flawlessly. The load times are no different than they are on my PC, and the small remote is perfect. I can also take this anywhere with a wifi connection easily -- hotels, friend's house, etc. -- because it's tiny.
